content.title: MUTUAL NON-DISCLOSURE AGREEMENT
content.recitals: The Parties wish to exchange Confidential Information for the Purpose and agree to mutual confidentiality obligations.

key_clauses.definition:
1. DEFINITIONS
'Confidential Information' means information disclosed by either Party.
'Disclosing Party' means the Party disclosing information.
'Receiving Party' means the Party receiving information.
'Purpose' means [PURPOSE].
key_clauses.obligations:
2. MUTUAL OBLIGATIONS
Each Party as Receiving Party shall:
(a) Keep Confidential Information secret
(b) Use it only for the Purpose
(c) Disclose only to employees/advisers on need-to-know basis
(d) Protect with reasonable care
key_clauses.exclusions:
3. EXCLUSIONS
(a) Public domain information
(b) Prior lawful possession
(c) Independent development
(d) Lawful third-party receipt
(e) Required disclosure by law (with notice)
key_clauses.term:
4. TERM
[TERM] from date. Confidentiality survives [SURVIVAL] after termination.
key_clauses.return:
5. RETURN
On request/termination, return or destroy all Confidential Information.
key_clauses.no_partnership:
6. NO PARTNERSHIP
This Agreement does not create partnership, employment, or obligation to enter into further agreements.
key_clauses.governing_law:
7. GOVERNING LAW
English law. Exclusive jurisdiction of English courts.
